member.name: IPropertyStoreFactory.GetPropertyStore
member.summary: Gets an object that corresponds to the supplied flags.
member.param: values that modify the store that is returned.

Optional. A pointer to the of an object that implements . If pUnkFactory is provided, this method can create the handler instance using ICreateObject rather than , if implemented. The reason to provide pUnkFactory is usually to create the handler in a different process. However, for most users, passing NULL in this parameter is sufficient.
A reference to IID of the object to create.
When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyStoreFactory.GetPropertyStoreForKeys
member.summary: Gets an object, given a set of property keys. This provides an alternative, possibly faster, method of getting an IPropertyStore object compared to calling .
member.param: A pointer to an array of structures.
The number of structures in the array pointed to by rgKeys.
values that modify the store that is returned.
A reference to IID of the object to create.
When this method returns, contains the address of an interface pointer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyStoreFactory
member.summary: Exposes methods to get an object.
